item.title: Caitlin Clark and Neuroscience Both Recommend This Stress-Busting Ritual
item.description: You don’t need to play for the WNBA to benefit from this hoops superstar’s science-backed trick to kill stress and perform at your peak.

item.title: Am I Being a Dress Code Snob?
item.description: It drives me nuts to see employees in jeans and t-shirts.

item.title: Service Sector Jobs are Down — What This Means for Small Businesses
item.description: The July survey results from the Institute for Supply Management supports the jobs data the Bureau of Labor Statistics chief was fired for.

item.title: Corporate Boards Are Dropping the Ball on Their No. 1 Job
item.description: A new report shows barely a quarter of board members cite CEO succession as a top priority.

item.title: How This Data-Thirsty Startup Is Taking on Parkinson’s Disease With an App
item.description: Rune Labs is all about brain data collection, an approach that could help with Parkinson’s and other diseases.
